template.name: magentoConfigPluginXml
template.value:
<template name="magentoConfigPluginXml" value="<type name="$typeName$">
 <plugin name="$pluginName$" type="$pluginClass$"/>
</type>
$END$" description="" toReformat="false" toShortenFQNames="true"> <variable name="typeName" expression="" defaultValue="\Class\To\Plugin" alwaysStopAt="true" /> <variable name="pluginName" expression="" defaultValue="mynamespace_mymodule_pluginName" alwaysStopAt="true" /> <variable name="pluginClass" expression="" defaultValue="\MyNamespace\MyModule\Plugin\Name" alwaysStopAt="true" /> <context> <option name="XML" value="true" /> </context> </template>
